abstract: Andy Webster reviews Drea Cooper and Zackary Canepari film T-Rex, documentary on Claressa Shields, first female boxer to win Olympic gold medal.

headline.print_headline: Review: ‘T-Rex’ Fights Like a Girl. And That’s Worth Gold. Event Info
headline.main: Review: ‘T-Rex’ Fights Like a Girl. And That’s Worth Gold.

snippet: Claressa Shields, the first female boxer to win an Olympic gold medal, is the indomitable center of Drea Cooper and Zackary Canepari’s impressive documentary.
lead_paragraph: Claressa Shields, the first female boxer to win an Olympic gold medal, is the indomitable center of Drea Cooper and Zackary Canepari’s impressive documentary.
